All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AstNode
Represents a node in the JSON syntax tree.
AstNodeType
Represents the type for an AstNode.
InvalidAbstractSyntaxTreeException
Exception thrown whenever a JSON AST is not in a valid state.
InvalidCharacterException
Exception for when an invalid character is found during tokenization.
InvalidControlCharacterException
Exception thrown when an invalid control character is found during tokenization.
InvalidDecimalNumberException
Exception thrown when an invalid decimal number is found during tokenization.
InvalidKeywordException
Exception for when an invalid keyword is found during tokenization.
InvalidNegativeNumberException
Exception thrown when an invalid negative number is found during tokenization.
InvalidSyntaxException
Exception thrown when invalid syntax is discovered during parsing.
InvalidUnicodeCharacterException
Exception thrown when an invalid unicode character is found during tokenization.
JsonArray
JsonArray is an array of JsonElements.
JsonArrayBuilder
JsonArrayBuilder provides convenient methods for creating a new JsonArray.
JsonElement
JsonElement represents any valid JSON value.
JsonElementType
Represents different types of JsonElements.
JsonElementTypeException
Exception thrown when JsonElement is used in an unexpected way.
JsonMapper<T>
JsonMapper defines how a class will be converted to and from JsonObjects.
JsonObject
JsonObject is a Map of JsonElement.
JsonObjectBuilder
JsonObjectBuilder provides convenient methods for creating a new JsonObject.
SolaJson
SolaJson contains methods for parsing strings into JsonElements and serializing JsonElements into strings.
SolaJsonParser
A JSON parser implementation.
SolaJsonSerializer
SolaJsonSerializer contains methods for serializing JsonElements, JsonObjects and JsonArrays.
SolaJsonSerializerConfig
Holds configuration properties for SolaJsonSerializer.
SolaJsonTokenizer
A JSON tokenizer implementation.
StringNotClosedException
Exception thrown when a string was discovered to be not closed during tokenization.
Token
Creates a new token instance of TokenType with value.
TokenType
Tokens that SolaJsonTokenizer will recognize.
